title: MACGYVER SEASON 06 EP. 09-10 (GR SUBS)
description:
MacGyver (1985 - 1992)
TV Series - 48 min - Action | Adventure | Crime

The MacGyver is a secret agent with a mission to neutralize those who undermine global peace and justice. But what makes it special is the means used to face the enemy. Unlike other agents, the MacGyver in possession of the finest and most effective super-weapon, which is nothing more than imaginative mind. Refusing to use conventional weapons, the only means usually a Swiss Army knife and insulating films, MacGyver chooses each time the most appropriate combination of knowledge for chemistry, physics and practical to cope with the toughest conditions or to trap the enemy. And as much enemies underestimate unorthodox methods, the more likely their plans to fail ...

Creator: Lee David Zlotoff
Stars: Richard Dean Anderson, Dana Elcar, Stephen Chang
